channel.title: Adding a gladiator mini-game
channel.description: yes i have made this from scratch it is not a gladiator skill like hellz, so im not leeching i still give him credits for the idea. now back to my problem ive made the full arena and everything.. all i need is to know how to make it a [b]Unsafe-Zone[/b] someone help?
